title: Enterprise File Fabric

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of the Enterprise File Fabric to connect to

root_folder_id.title: Root Folder ID
root_folder_id.description: ID of the root folder. Leave blank normally

permanent_token.title: Permanent Authentication Token
permanent_token.description: Permanent Authentication Token created in Dashboard under Security. Valid for several years

$comment: Session token and token_expiry are managed internally by rclone
